title: Traitor
author: VD
content_html:
Impeach President Bush. Now.

President Bush signed an agreement creating a “permanent body” that commits the U.S. to “deeper transatlantic economic integration,” without ratification by the Senate as a treaty or passage by Congress as a law.

The “Transatlantic Economic Integration” between the U.S. and the European Union was signed April 30 at the White House by Bush, German Chancellor Angela Merkel – the current president of the European Council – and European Commission President José Manuel Barroso.

I knew Bush was a lying, treasonous weasel from the moment I heard the words “compassionate conservative”. But I had no idea that he’d surpass Bill Clinton and Jimmy Carter as one of America’s worst presidents. He already ranks down there with Lincoln and FDR in my book. In the eighteen months preceding his passing the baton to Hillary, he may yet reach the utter depths of Woodrow Wilson.
content_text:
Impeach President Bush.  Now.
President Bush
signed an agreement
creating a “permanent body” that commits the U.S. to “deeper transatlantic economic integration,” without ratification by the Senate as a treaty or passage by Congress as a law.
The “Transatlantic Economic Integration” between the U.S. and the European Union was signed April 30 at the White House by Bush, German Chancellor Angela Merkel – the current president of the European Council – and European Commission President José Manuel Barroso.
I knew Bush was a lying, treasonous weasel from the moment I heard the words “compassionate conservative”.  But I had no idea that he’d surpass Bill Clinton and Jimmy Carter as one of America’s worst presidents.  He already ranks down there with Lincoln and FDR in my book.  In the eighteen months preceding his passing the baton to Hillary, he may yet reach the utter depths of Woodrow Wilson.
